name: Bloodwych: Data Disks Vol. 1
storyline: Just when you thught you'd won! In the final battle of Bloodwych, the Lord of Entropy was not in fact jilled, he was merely "jected" from our world into his own. To take his revenge, he has summoned you to his world, where he has created a new dungeon that makes Treihadwyl seem like a holiday camp. Fail in your quest to banish him and he wll feast slowly on your soul.
summary:
This expansion adds another 25 levels, 8 new spells and the ability to have monsters join your party

In order to play the Data Disk it is needed to import a saved game from the original game.
